text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
D.C. Resolution 20-217, effective July 10, 2013

20 DCSTAT 2046

A RESOLUTION

Proposed
Resolution
20-170

To confirm the reappointment of Mr. David C. Bowers to the Housing Production Trust Fund Board.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Housing Production Trust Fund Board David C. Bowers
Confirmation Resolution of 2013."

Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:
Mr. David C. Bowers
1350 D Street, N.E.
Washington, D.C. 20012
(Ward 6)
as a member, representing the financial services industry, of the Housing Production Trust Fund
Board, established by section 3a of the Housing Production Trust Fund Act of 1988, effective
June 8, 1990 (D.C. Law 8-133; D.C. Official Code § 42-2802.01), for a term to end January 14,
2015.
Sec. 3. The Secretary to the Council shall transmit a copy of this resolution, upon its
adoption, to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Housing
Production
Trust Fund
Board
David C. Bowers
Confirmation
Resolution of
2013
